呉れて遣る: (くれてやる) - to give; to do (something) for
呉れる: (くれる) - (v1-s,vt)  (くれ is an irregular alternative imperative form) to give; to let one have; to do for one; to be given
呉れ手: (くれて) - donor; one who does something for you
呉服: (gofuku) - cloth (para roupas japonesas), kimono fabrics, textile, drapery, dry goods, piece goods; silk fabrics
呉服尺: (ごふくじゃく) - fabric shaku (approx. 36.4 cm)
呉服物: (ごふくもの) - piece; dry-goods; piece goods
呉竹: (クレタケ) - Alternative name for henon bamboo (Phyllostachys nigra var. henonis)
呉茱萸: (ゴシュユ) - Tetradium ruticarpum (species of deciduous trees)
呉越: (ごえつ) - Go-Etsu; two rival states in ancient China
呉越同舟: (ごえつどうしゅう) - (yoji) bitter enemies (placed by fate) in the same boat
呉音: (ごおん) - Wu-dynasty reading of Chinese characters
告ぐ: (つぐ) - (v2g-s,vt)    to tell/to inform/to announce; to indicate/to signal/to mark
告げる: (つげる) - to tell/to inform/to announce; to indicate/to signal/to mark
告る: (コクる) - (from 告白する)  to confess (one's love); to propose (marriage); to ask out (on a date)
告天子: (こうてんし) - skylark (Alauda arvensis); (こうてんし only) Mongolian lark (Melanocorypha mongolica)
告文: (こくぶん) - written report to the gods; imperial edict; written appeal to a superior
告朔: (こうさく) - ceremony where the Emperor would inspect the records of attendance and absence of officials
告発状: (こくはつじょう) - bill of indictment
告白: (こくはく) - confession/acknowledgement/acknowledgment; profession of love; confession of sins (e.g. the confessional)
告訴: (こくそ) - accusation; complaint; charge; legal action
呑まれる: (のまれる) - to be swallowed up/to be engulfed; to be overwhelmed/to be overawed
呑み: (のみ) - drink/drinking; spigot/tap (in a cask, etc.); stock market bucketing; bookmaking
呑み代: (のみしろ) - drink money; drinking money
呑み助: (のみすけ) - tippler; drunkard; heavy drinker
呑み口: (のみぐち) - (usu. のみくち) taste (of a liquid, esp. alcoholic beverages); someone who enjoys alcohol; place one's lips touch on the rim of a cup; shape of one's mouth when drinking; (usu. のみぐち) tap/faucet/spigot
呑み屋: (のみや) - bookmaker/bookie; trader performing (stock market) bucketing/bucket shop
呑み歩く: (のみあるく) - to go bar-hopping; to go on a pub crawl
呑み込む: (のみこむ) - to gulp down/to swallow deeply; to understand/to take in/to catch on to/to learn/to digest; to engulf/to swallow up; to be filled with (people)/to be crowded; to hold back from saying something/to swallow (one's words)
呑む: (のむ) - (呑む is often used metaphorically; 服む is often used for medicine) to drink/to gulp/to swallow/to take (medicine); (also written 喫む)  to smoke (tobacco); to engulf/to overwhelm; to keep down/to suppress; to accept (e.g. demand, condition); to make light of/to conceal
呑んで掛かる: (のんでかかる) - to make light of; to hold lightly
呑口: (のみぐち) - (usu. のみくち) taste (of a liquid, esp. alcoholic beverages); someone who enjoys alcohol; place one's lips touch on the rim of a cup; shape of one's mouth when drinking; (usu. のみぐち) tap/faucet/spigot
呑吐: (どんと) - drinking and vomiting; coming and going
呑気: (ノンキ) - carefree; optimistic; careless; reckless; heedless; happy-go-lucky; easygoing; thoughtless
呑舟の魚: (どんしゅうのうお) - big fish; great man; notorious man
呑込む: (のみこむ) - to gulp down/to swallow deeply; to understand/to take in/to catch on to/to learn/to digest; to engulf/to swallow up; to be filled with (people)/to be crowded; to hold back from saying something/to swallow (one's words)
呟く: (つぶやく) - to mutter/to murmur/to grumble; to tweet (Twitter)
周: (shuu/mawa) - circumference , Zhou dynasty (China, approx. 1046-256 BCE), Chou dynasty; perimeter; counter for laps or circuits
周く: (あまねく) - widely; generally; universally; far and wide
周到綿密: (しゅうとうめんみつ) - (yoji) extremely complete (thorough, careful) and detailed
周回コース: (しゅうかいコース) - circuit track; circular course
周回遅れ: (しゅうかいおくれ) - being a lap behind (e.g. motor sports); someone who is very behind the times
周壁: (しゅうへき) - peripheral wall; surrounding wall
周天: (しゅうてん) - the full scope of the heavens/360 degrees/one full revolution of the earth; twelve years/one full cycle of the Chinese calendar
周尺: (しゅうしゃく) - Zhou shaku (approx. 20 cm)
周旋: (しゅうせん) - good offices/recommendation/mediation; (Tokugawa-era) employment office
周旋屋: (しゅうせんや) - broker; employment agency
周旋料: (しゅうせんりょう) - brokerage; commission
周旋業: (しゅうせんぎょう) - brokerage; commission agency
周旋業者: (しゅうせんぎょうしゃ) - broker; middleman; employment agency
周易: (しゅうえき) - divination (based on the Book of Changes)
周期冗長検査: (しゅうきじょうちょうけんさ) - CRC; Cyclic Redundancy Check
